name: Minecraft2D (but unsettling)
description:
◼️ Minecraft2D, not terraria, and much more disturbing and unsettling to play.

◼️ Controls:

A: move left, D: move right

Mouse left click: break blocks

Mouse right click: place blocks

S: enable placing stone

Q: diasble placing stone

◼️ Watch the youtube video about the making of this game, in only a couple hours!
